mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_prod_child( id, parent_id, value_detail_id, statu, real_score, create_date, update_date, note1, note2, note3, note4 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{valueDetailId}, #{statu}, #{realScore}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{note1}, #{note2}, #{note3}, #{note4} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pj_prod_child SET parent_id = #{parentId}, value_detail_id = #{valueDetailId}, statu = #{statu}, real_score = #{realScore}, update_date = #{updateDate}, note1 = #{note1}, note2 = #{note2}, note3 = #{note3}, note4 = #{note4} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id as "id",a.statu as "statu",a.real_score as "realScore",a.create_date as "createDate", CONCAT(d.`name`,'(', round(d.score) ,'åˆ†)') as "name",d.score as "score" from pj_prod_child a LEFT JOIN pj_value_details d on a.value_detail_id=d.id where a.parent_id=#{parentId} and date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(), '%Y-%m') ORDER BY d.cate_id
